[DQC.IFRS.0115.9565] The concept ifrs-full:RevenueOfAcquiree with a period duration starting on 2021-12-31 and ending on 2022-01-01 or 1 days with a reported value of 250,108,000,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2021-12-31 and ends on 2022-12-31 with a value of 211,081,000,000. The value 250,108,000,000 for the period of 1 days should be less or the same as the value 211,081,000,000 with a duration of 365 days assuming that the concept ifrs-full:RevenueOfAcquiree cannot have a negative value. The properties of this ifrs-full:RevenueOfAcquiree fact are: Period :2022-01-01 to 2022-01-01 Dimensions : ifrs-full:BusinessCombinationsAxis=skm:SKmandserviceCoLtdMember, skm:AcquirerAxis=skm:PsMarketingCorporationMember Unit : KRW
